item.createaddition.multimeter.title: [Multimeter]:
item.createaddition.multimeter.no_capabi: No Forge Energy capability on this side.
item.createaddition.multimeter.tooltip.s: Measures _capacity_ and _input/output_ on any side with a _Forge energy capability_.
item.createaddition.copper_spool.tooltip: R-Clicking two _Connectors_ will create a wire link between them and return an _Empty Spool_.
item.createaddition.gold_spool.tooltip.s: R-Clicking two _Connectors_ will create a wire link between them and return an _Empty Spool_.
item.createaddition.seed_oil_bucket.tool: A simple _flammable liquid_ which can power the _Crude Burner_.
item.createaddition.bioethanol_bucket.to: An efficient _flammable liquid_ which can power the _Crude Burner_.
item.createaddition.biomass_pellet.toolt: A _solid fuel_ which can smelt _6 items_ in a _Furnace_ .
item.createaddition.overcharged_hammer.t: This trusty _Hammer_ has been infused with the power of _electricity_
item.createaddition.spool.tooltip.summar: R-Clicking two _Connectors_ linked by a wire will remove the wire link and return a filled _spool_.
deprecated.block.createaddition.electric: Generates _su_ from _fe_ and has configurable _speed_. The energy consumption is based on the set _rpm_.
deprecated.block.createaddition.alternat: Generates _fe_ from _su_. The amount of energy produced is based on _rpm_.
deprecated.block.createaddition.rolling_: A kinetic component suitable for _rolling_ inserted _materials_. Can be powered by connecting to the shaft at the sides. Results have to be extracted from the component.
Starts applying _rolling recipes_ to any items inserted from the side or the top of the block.
block.createaddition.heater.engine_heati: Heating Furnace Engines has been disabled in the Configs.
deprecated.block.createaddition.heater.t: When attached to a _Furnace_ and powered with _fe_ from the top will heat the _Furnace_. Will not power a _Furnace Engine_ unless _enabled_ in the _configs_.
block.createaddition.accumulator.tooltip: Provides _fe_ to _wires_ connected to the _connector_ marked with a upwards arrow.
Accepts _fe_ from _wires_ connected to the _connector_ marked with a downwards arrow.
block.createaddition.connector.tooltip.s: Connects Forge Energy compatible blocks with _wires_ to transfer _fe_.
block.createaddition.connector.tooltip.a: While holding a _Copper Spool_ or _Gold Spool_ to create a _wire link_ between two _Connectors_.
block.createaddition.connector_copper.to: Connects Forge Energy compatible blocks with _wires_ to transfer _fe_.
While holding a _Copper Spool_ to create a _wire link_ between two _Connectors_.
block.createaddition.connector_gold.tool: Connects Forge Energy compatible blocks with _wires_ to transfer _fe_.
While holding a _Gold Spool_ to create a _wire link_ between two _Connectors_.
block.createaddition.redstone_relay.tool: Allows _fe_ to pass from the _input connector_ to the _output connector_ when receiving a _redstone signal_.
Provides _fe_ to _wires_ connected to the _connector_ marked with a upwards arrow.
Accepts _fe_ from _wires_ connected to the _connector_ marked with a downwards arrow.
block.createaddition.furnace_burner.tool: This _Furnace_ won't smelt items, but can instead be used to power a _Furnace Engine_ without the need for a smelting recipe. _Fuel_ can be inserted using for example a _Hopper_.
block.createaddition.crude_burner.toolti: The _Crude Burner_ consume slow-burning _flammable liquids_ like _Seed Oil_ or _Bioethanol_ to power the _Furnace Engine_. The _liquid fuel_ can be inserted using _Fluid Pipes_.
createaddition.command.cca_api.link: Click here to open API documentation
createaddition.ponder.electric_motor.hea: Generating Rotational Force using Electric Motors
createaddition.ponder.electric_motor.tex: Electric Motors are a compact and configurable source of Rotational Force
Scrolling on the back panel changes the RPM of the motors' rotational output
The Electric Motor requires a source of energy (fe)
The motors' energy consumption is determined by the set RPM
createaddition.ponder.alternator.header: Generating Electric energy using an Alternator
createaddition.ponder.alternator.text_1: The Alternator requires atleast 32 RPM to operate
createaddition.ponder.alternator.text_2: It generates electric energy (fe) from rotational force
createaddition.ponder.alternator.text_3: It's energy production is determined by the input RPM
createaddition.ponder.rolling_mill.heade: Rolling metals into Rods and Wires
createaddition.ponder.rolling_mill.text_: The Rolling Mill uses rotational force to roll metals into Rods and Wires
To manually input items, drop Ingots or Plates on the top of the Mill
Right-click the Mill to manually retrieve the output items
createaddition.ponder.automated_rolling_: The Rolling Mill can be automated using a Belt and two Funnels
createaddition.ponder.heater.header: Using electric energy to heat a furnace
createaddition.ponder.heater.text_1: The heater can be placed on any side facing the furnace
createaddition.ponder.heater.text_2: When connected to a sufficient source of electric energy (fe), the Heater will light the Furnace
createaddition.ponder.heater.text_3: The Furnace will stay lit as long as enough energy is provided
Using ComputerCraft to control an Electric Motor
The Electric Motor can be controlled using ComputerCraft
Get to the API documentation by issuing the command '/cca_api' in the chat
createaddition.ponder.tesla_coil.header: Using a Tesla Coil to charge Items
createaddition.ponder.tesla_coil.text_1: The Tesla Coil will charge Items below it
createaddition.ponder.tesla_coil.text_2: It will charge any Forge Energy Items and more!
createaddition.ponder.tesla_coil_hurt.te: The Tesla Coil is also able to inflict damage on nearby Players and Mobs
This can be activated with a Redstone signal
death.attack.tesla_coil.player: %1$s received a lethal electric shock while fighting %2$s
